title: Real-time coloration control of gallium-based strips through cold rolling
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22086-22090
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03012E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jing Liu, Hao Kang, Wencheng Song, Xu Bi, Dandan Shi, Youzheng Sun, Weizheng Cheng, Weiye Zhang, Junfeng Zhao, Han Dai
Fast discoloration of the liquid metal due to the addition of Al creates a solid colorful “skin” on the LM surface, which can be peeled off through real-time cold rolling.
